alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 5:45PM MST until July 19 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... * Until 630 PM MST. * At 545 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Star Valley, or 7 miles east of Payson, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Star Valley, Tonto Village and Ponderosa Campground. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
